text: Sharon does makeup is wondering if she
should take a gap year before starting
college or university or going through
college or university first before
traveling I would recommend both oh why
not
I believe that most people do not know
what they want to do who they want to be
who they are once they graduate high
school but were pressured with this idea
that we have to go to college we have to
go to university and did get into
Pullman or degree and in order to be
successful in order to get a job and
then have a family and buy a house and
have all these amazing things how are
you supposed to know at age 17 or 18 or
whatever what you want to do for the
rest of your life you've spent your
entire life going to school and living
this routine life and not going out and
exploring the world that you live in and
getting to know who you are and what you

recommend taking a gap here before you
go to college University and I guarantee
that you will have such a better idea of
the person you are and what you want to
do with life by traveling after high
school you are going to get to know
yourself on an entirely different level
and experience these incredible things
you never even knew existed and you need
to go out there you need to see the
world and in order to know what you're
interested in and who you are even for
me I have always been interested in
acting I've loved it it's been a passion
of mine since I was very little but I
didn't understand how much acting meant
to me and that I definitely wanted to
pursue it until I travel for nearly a
year remember I was sitting on a train
in India I was by myself for 60 hours on
a train across India 60 hours alone in a
train I went through my entire life in
my head and always spot
past memories I hadn't even thought of
since when they happened and then it
clicked I had this thought that I need
to act and when I am done this trip I'm
going to enjoy myself to the max why I'm
here exploring the world but when I go
home I'm gonna pursue acting I'm gonna
do it and it took that train ride for me
to realize that and and be ready to go
go for it so yes I recommend going on a
gappiya before you go to college
university and there gonna be many
people that are going to to try to
convince you not to do that that you
should go to college and university
because that is the right thing to do
and of course that's what society
believes because that's that's the norm
and that's what they think is right and
it's not that is not how things work not
anymore
maybe back in the day when our parents
were our age but not anymore of course
when you're doing college or university
you can travel again travel with many
times as you want but I would definitely
